Text: roll call for skiingPST hi everone Im trying to get a feel for who may be interested in a south lake tahoe ski shindig I looked into the place we rented years ago when cooper flew down from portland via reno on the snowiest day of the year and it is available as soon as March Yeah not that soon maybe this will give the sky a chance to bear snow Between people nights a hottub fireplace heavenly company etc it would cost about person for the weekend Let me know what weekends onafter March would work for you and how many people including yourself may like to come let it snow let it snow let it snow G
